Apps

CALCULATOR

A beautifully designed, and useful calculator app. A must-have for your web app collection.

TRIANGLE ANALYZER

Take the hard work out of trigonometry. Determines the all angles and side lengths of a traingle from given inputs.

QUADRATIC FORMULA

Find x of a quadratic equation by inputting a, b, and c! Also provides additional information such as the number of roots, vertex, etc.
